event.name: FR_URN_BONUS
event.text: Before you can see what strange loot that ship had, a strange sensation fills your very soul, you blink, and suddenly you see the visions of the urn. It slowly open its white lid ever so slowly, suddenly, the souls of every apparition you killed so far seems to fill the urn, mixing and swirling around, creating brand new shades never before seen here or anywhere else. It finally, after what feels like hours if not days, closes itself shut.
It takes a few minutes for you to recover, but as you do, you manage to get your thoughts in order enough to see what the ship's loot was.

event.name: FR_HAUNT_APPARITION_FLAGSHIP_DROP
event.text: You are surprised to find another crew hidden in the depths of the ship, however, they do not attack you. Not only that, they seem to think you are their "creator" and swear to serve your every whim. Upon exploring the room you find lots of papers talking about a scrapped project that aimed to clone the Coalition's leaders, but it seems that after a single attempt it was deemed a failure and was thus scrapped.

...The ship hails you.
"Hark, pray to the lords that you evacuate with haste! Elsewise thine vessel's rust and decay might erode mine own's most invaluable shine! Shall thou refuse to meet my demands, expect a most swift death of peculiar means... For I shall dismantle thine hull with projectiles of solid gold, salvage the remains, and become even richer!"
Realizing there's no way out of here without a fight, you turn on your weapons and engage the ship.

The ship hails you.
"Oh my stars! If it isn't a new friend! Now, please don't be upset, dear, but forces beyond my control are forcing me to fight you! Isn't that crazy? Quite unfortunate for you, but at least I promisse you I will keep you company in the afterlife, you are my new friend after all!"

Legends say this ship is now owned by a equinoid arch demon of Tartarus, one which calls themselves the "Prince of Darkness". The ship hails you, though no words are spoken, the demon simply stares into your soul, their words being branded into your very mind.
"Yet another mortal steps up to challenge me it seems. I will be blunt with you, little creature, you are about to face a being from the very depts of the intangeble, one which has seen eons by. This is not a threat, it's only a warning. Gather your wits and face me, for great rewards away anyone who can best me in combat."

I shall grand you the schematics of my very ship and its wonderful technology, as well as my very own weapon, one which I forged myself a millenia ago. As a final gift, I shall join your crew for the remainder of your little errand. I do hope your efforts don't shame my presence".

After you finally regain your senses, you realize that this ship is so enigmatic that it doesn't have any legends attached to it, no stories, no database details, nothing.
Suddunly you feel a strong force hit your mind, the being in charge of the ship is trying to communicate to you, its words sear your mind, the pain is indescribable. "C H I L D O F M A N, D O N O T R E S I S T T H E C A L L, S U B M I T."

event.name: FR_HAUNT_APPARITION_TRIRIAC_DEADCREW
event.text: The mighty vessel has been vanquished! Within the now cleared cruiser, plenty of scrap and supplies remain for the taking.

event.name: FR_HAUNT_APPARITION_TRIRIAC_DROP
event.text:
You're also surprised to find a special haunted gun among the wreckage! You've never seen anything even remotely to something like this before, so you assume it's from a cluster unlike yours.
You expect the strange being to greet you, and indeed, the strange being appears in front of you. You brace for the mental assault, and yet it never arrived, instead the strange being just retreats into the bowls of the ship. Seems like they will work with you for now.
